original_title: CBSL presents 2022 Annual Report to President
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Annual Report of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka for the year 2022 was presented to President Ranil Wickremesinghe on Thursday (27) by Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe, the Governor of the Central Bank.
The Regional Conference of the Charted Accountants of Sri Lanka was held on Thurday (27) in Jaffna.
